short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filter problem list on cses.fi based on topics, and personal status

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Select the next programming problem to solve based on topics, and your personal attempt status.

A filter menu will appear when you browse the problem set. Simply select the topics you want to try and the status of the problem (solved/unsolved/in progress). The problems list will be filtered so you can find what you want more easily.
